comment_completeness: All parts (a)-(d) answered with expressions.
comment_method: Used binomial/geometric ideas, but swapped p and 1-p in (a),(b), omitted X=0 in (c), and ignored conditioning in (d).
comment_finalanswer: Incorrect for all parts: (a),(b) probabilities reversed; (c) missing p^40 term; (d) not conditioned on X<=4.
comment_arithmetic: Exponent placement/probability terms incorrect; missing term in (c).

comment_completeness: Responses given for all parts, but (b) uses an ellipsis and none are fully specified correctly.
